'''Dalong''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in [[Chongyun]]'s [[Hangout Event]], Act I: [[Signs of Evil]].

NPC Location Dalong Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
<!--detailed story/lore information goes here-->
Dalong has a younger sister named [[Little Le]] and wanted to get one of Chongyun's popsicles for her to try. Chongyun says his popsicles are rather tasteless, but Dalong still persists. Dalong's mother is [[Yuyan]]. When playing hide and seek, he is located behind a crate at the back alleyway of the left side of [[Chen the Sharp]]'s food stand.

===Personality===
Dalong is a very caring older brother who always tries to make his little sister happy. He likes to play and taste new dishes, and even though he sometimes gets into trouble, as mentioned by himself after talking to his mother, he's really polite and tries not to cause trouble to others.

===Appearance===
A small boy with light brown hair and grayish eyes, uses a traditional Chinese style shirt, shorts and high boots.
